text: Vuga uti:- mwebwe bantu, mu vy’ukuri jewe nd’intumwa y’Imana kuri mwebwe mwese, Imana ifise ubwami bw’Amajuru n’Isi, rero ntawundi ategerezwa gusengwa atariyo yonyene gusa, niyo irema kandi niyo yica, rero nimwemere Imana hamwe n’intumwa yayo ariyo ntumwa itazi gusoma n’ukwandika ikaba ariyo yemera Imana hamwe n’amajambo yayo, kandi nimuyikurikire kugira ngo murongoke
